slide.title: Sending Headers

example.title: Sending Headers requires an extra few steps:

slide.example:
<?php
require_once('SOAP/Client.php\');

$client = new SOAP_Client('http://www.caraveo.com/soap_interop/server_round2.php');

$header = new SOAP_Header(
        '{http://soapinterop.org/echoheader/}echoMeStringRequest',
        'string',
        'This is a test header',
        1, /* defaults to zero */
        'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next'  /* this is the default */
        );

$client->addHeader($header);

$response = $client->call('echoVoid');
print $client->wire;
?>
